mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TASHU_RIDE ( RIDE_ID, USER_ID, START_STATION_ID, END_STATION_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, DISTANCE, DURATION, CO2_SAVED, CALORIES, POINTS, STATUS, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{rideId}, #{userId}, #{startStationId}, #{endStationId}, TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{distance}, #{duration}, #{co2Saved}, #{calories}, #{points}, #{status}, TO_DATE(#{createDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TASHU_RIDE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY START_TIME DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TASHU_RIDE SET END_STATION_ID = #{endStationId}, END_TIME = #{endTime}, DISTANCE = #{distance}, DURATION = #{duration}, CO2_SAVED = #{co2Saved}, CALORIES = #{calories}, POINTS = #{points}, STATUS = #{status} WHERE RIDE_ID = #{rideId}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId, SUM(DISTANCE) as distance, SUM(DURATION) as duration, SUM(POINTS) as points, COUNT(*) as totalRides, SUM(CO2_SAVED) as co2Saved, SUM(CALORIES) as calories FROM TASHU_RIDE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND STATUS = 'C' GROUP BY USER_ID
SELECT * FROM TASHU_RIDE ORDER BY START_TIME DESC

SELECT userId, points, distance, duration, totalRides, co2Saved, calories, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY points DESC) as currentRank FROM ( SELECT USER_ID as userId, SUM(POINTS) as points, SUM(DISTANCE) as distance, SUM(DURATION) as duration, COUNT(*) as totalRides, SUM(CO2_SAVED) as co2Saved, SUM(CALORIES) as calories FROM TASHU_RIDE WHERE STATUS = 'C' GROUP BY USER_ID ) ORDER BY points DESC FETCH FIRST 50 ROWS ONLY

SELECT userId, points, distance, duration, totalRides, co2Saved, calories, currentRank FROM ( SELECT USER_ID as userId, SUM(POINTS) as points, SUM(DISTANCE) as distance, SUM(DURATION) as duration, COUNT(*) as totalRides, SUM(CO2_SAVED) as co2Saved, SUM(CALORIES) as calories, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(POINTS) DESC) as currentRank FROM TASHU_RIDE WHERE STATUS = 'C' GROUP BY USER_ID ) WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT userId, points, distance, duration, totalRides, co2Saved, calories, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY points DESC) as currentRank FROM ( SELECT USER_ID as userId, SUM(POINTS) as points, SUM(DISTANCE) as distance, SUM(DURATION) as duration, COUNT(*) as totalRides, SUM(CO2_SAVED) as co2Saved, SUM(CALORIES) as calories FROM TASHU_RIDE WHERE STATUS = 'C' AND TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{month} GROUP BY USER_ID ) ORDER BY points DESC FETCH FIRST 50 ROWS ONLY
